response.overview: Chris has been training as a mountain athlete for roughly two years now. He mainly focuses on trail running and backcountry skiing. Last year Chris competed in Max Vert October through The Cirque Series, he ran 250k uphill vert. Since then heâ€™s dug deeper into the backcountry & started to take his training to higher levels.  Chris Fisher has decided to dedicate the month of October to winning this year's Max Vert October. During this month Chris will be pursuing World Record attempt for the most vertical ft gained in one month. Chris has set out for a goal of 400k ft uphill.
response.title: CHRIS FISHER - TO THE TOP
